title: Person of Interest - BTS 5x13 'return 0' - Jim Caviezel & Tony Vincent rehearsing fight scene
author: POISuit
comment: Love this! I've watched it several times now, especially the movements at 0:04. Might look simple, but if Jim screwed that up, the entire sequence falls apart. Which is why I appreciate the work the actors and stunt team put in to make sure these sequences are executed seamlessly.
Please continue uploading these kind of videos
I thought the actors did their own stunts for this show?
description:
Jim Caviezel vs stunt coordinator Tony Vincent (he is also Jim's stunt double since Pilot) rehearsing last Reese's hand-to-hand fight scene.

Kate Bogle (@boglesthemind)

Stunt Coord Tony Vincent's final appearance.
